name: Highway Outta Hell (Futuregames)
description:
Welcome to Hell! Wait… What the stone gorgon are you doing here? You’re not dead! Argh, get in the boat mortal, I will build you a Highway Outta Hell ~ Charon 

This couch co-op experience will take you on an adventure in Greek hell. Play as an unlucky trespasser, which by accident ended up in the deepest abyss of Tartarus, fight for your life in an attempt to escape in Charon's boat or play as Charon the ferryman himself and build the road of salvation for the damned soul. 

Collect scarce pomegranate fruits on your way out, after all they don’t grow on trees.  Complete daring challenges working together in this unnatural tandem. Feel the heat of the lava and intense cooperation. 

Godspeed on your journey up the Highway Outta Hell!
